text: Kintu amikhan nimite poisa utha manu ke paap koribo nadibo, etu nimite nodi te jabi, ekta maas dhura kata phelabi aru juntu maas ke poila pai etu ke loi kene anibi. Jitia tumi maas laga mukh khuli loi, ta te charta chandi pabo. Lobi aru jai kene poisa utha manu ke tumi aru Ami nimite bhi dibi.”
